resources.string: After light is perceived by living things, it is interpreted and made meaningful according to the organs each living thing has and the abilities of these organs. That\'s why, every living things see objects differently.
The first thing required for the act of seeing to occur is light.

Our ability to distinguish objects depends entirely on their colour. For example, lets think about a number 8 hanging on the wall.
Do you think you can see that if it was the same color as wall?
Is there a number 8 on this wall?
As you can see the pictures above, to identify an object, color are very important.
Each color has a numerical equivalent for machines. The graphic below tells you this simply.

Machine learning gives a robot the ability to think like a human. But can a robot think completely like a human?
Everything we see with our eyes is interpreted by our brain and tried to make it meaningful.
The process of making what we see meaningful is learning.
Although many sense organs are used for this learning process, we can say that it basically starts with the eye and ends with the brain.
Everything we perceive with our sense organs is interpreted by the brain, with the help of nerves located all over our body.
The mystery of the human brain has not been solved even today.
Can a machine literally learn and think like a human?
The answer to this question should probably be no, while the human brain has not yet fully understood by humanity.
As a result of the developed technologies and many researches, the machines have gained great capabilities. Some of these are as follows:
- Answering the questions \n- Making physically moves\n- Ability to detect objects
We will learn a lot about machines that have many more abilities apart from these mentioned.
We learned a little about the human brain and what machines can learn.
So, can a machine start teaching people what it has learned?
Although machines can gain the ability to learn on their own, they are not comparable to humans.
With the development of technology, machines that are constantly developing may be much more advanced than the human brain in the future.
The biggest obstacle to achieving this is that the people who will develop these technologies are not working enough in this field.
You\'ve learned a lot about humans and robots so far. We can move on to the game world to reinforce these and learn more.
Do you want to go to Homepage?
Do you want to leave the game?
You can touch the screen for reaching the information
Artificial intelligence is the ability of a computer system to perform tasks often associated with abilities unique to intelligent beings.
Why do we need the Artificial Intelligence?

With the development of today\'s technology, new inventions have emerged. The purpose of these inventions is to make human life easier. The increasing number of inventions that will facilitate human life with artificial intelligence explains why we need artificial intelligence. An example is autonomous vehicles.

The working principle of artificial intelligence is to collect a lot of data, create data pools and prepare instructions on what to do by using this data by artificial intelligence. These guidelines are tested millions of times in lifelike simulations. It is developed in a continuous improvement cycle by weeding out faulty instructions and replicating the correct ones. At the end of this process, a faster and more accurate control mechanism is obtained than can be done using ordinary coding techniques. Once a good enough set of instructions is obtained, it can be finalized and tested in the real world.

Artificial intelligence is used in image processing, audio processing, text processing, data processing, decision support systems of autonomous vehicles, virtual assistants, game engines, suggestion systems and similar areas.
When Was the Term Artificial Intelligence First Used?
The term "Artificial Intelligence" was first used in 1956 at the "Dartmouth Conference", an artificial intelligence conference.
By Who Was The Term Artificial Intelligence Used?
The term “Artificial Intelligence” was first used by Computer Scientist and Cognitive Scientist “John McCarthy”.

Autonomous vehicles supported by artificial intelligence and deep learning algorithms are called vehicles that can operate without a driver thanks to their environmental sensing capabilities. This technology, which has already started to be used in daily travels and transportation, gives important clues to the future in the automotive world.

As a result of the impressions of the above-mentioned visuals, autonomous vehicles can drive safely by distinguishing the objects they see on the road, such as people, and by following the traffic rules.
Artificial intelligence is the ability of a computer system to mimic human cognitive functions such as learning and problem solving.
The term artificial intelligence was first coined in 1956 at a conference held at Dartmouth College in New Hampshire, England.
However, the reason why artificial intelligence is not so popular today is the increasing number of data that can be analyzed in our developing world.

In addition, the capabilities of artificial intelligence include functions such as understanding human speech, playing games that require counter-move, controlling devices that require autonomous operation, data analysis, military simulation, and photo-video analysis.

Artificial Neural Networks are parallel and distributed information processing structures, inspired by the human brain, connected to each other through weighted connections and consisting of processing elements, each of which has its own memory.
Let\'s Take A Look At The Neural Network Model
Let\'s Take A Look At A Real Neural Network

As we can see in the images, the way the artificial neural network and the simple biological nervous system work is very similar. In other words, it is the digital modeling of biological neuron cells and the synaptic bond that these cells establish with each other.
Uses of Artificial Intelligence Autonomous Vehicles

You Have Successfully Completed the Artificial Intelligence Basic Level Training

In classification, a dataset is assigned to one of the different and predetermined classes. Classification algorithms are based on learning which data to assign to which class from the given training set.
Clustering is the grouping of data showing similar characteristics in a data set. Within the same cluster, the similarities are high, and the similarities between the clusters are low.

It is the logical, sequential expression of all the operations needed to solve a problem. The concept of algorithm can be used in programming or software development, as well as activities in daily life, mathematics, etc. It provides the opportunity to solve the problems encountered in the lessons more easily.
